t: How To Choose A Pottery Wheel | Skutt.com
s: June 7, 2023 - A quick Google or Amazon search will bring up wheels that cost under $500. These are basically toys for children, not serious tools to develop your craft. Many of them are cheap imports that either lack the power necessary to properly throw a pot or are of such poor quality, the will only bring frustration as they disintegrate before your eyes.  · As a general rule, stick to name brands...
